remarks: The Kolmogorov quotient of a regular space is regular.  By ~ regr1 it is also Hausdorff, so we can also say that a space is regular iff the Kolmogorov quotient is regular Hausdorff (T_3).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement: kqreg $p |- ( J e. Reg <-> ( KQ ` J ) e. Reg ) $.
